chat_history.content: [START_SESSION]
Hi Jade! It's great to see you again for our second session. How has your week been?
its been well
That's good to hear! So, how did it go with your goal of turning off screens at 11 and being in bed by 11:30 for three days over the past two weeks?
well ive done one week so far and it went well

Oh, I apologize for the confusion! You're right, it's only been one week since our last session. I'm glad that first week went well with your screen time goal. 

On a scale of 1 to 10, how stressed were you this week?
Thanks for sharing that. A 4 is pretty manageable. What's been contributing to that stress level this week?
i've had a lot of projects to do

Projects can definitely pile up and create stress. Now that we're at the halfway point of the program, let's think about your goals for next week. You have three options: you could stick with the same screen time goal, keep that goal and add something new, or focus on completely different goals. What feels right for you?
jeep that goal and sdd something new
Great! So you'll keep working on turning off screens at 11 and being in bed by 11:30 three days a week. What new goal would you like to add for this week?
i want to walk more

Walking more is a great goal. To help make it specific, what exactly would walking more look like for you? For example, would it be walking around your neighborhood, walking to class, or something else?
walking around my neighborhood sounds good
Perfect. So walking around your neighborhood - how long would you want to walk each time, or how far?
30 min sounds doable
Awesome, 30 minutes of walking around your neighborhood. Now, how often would you like to do this during the week, and which days work best for you?
2x a week im thinking friday and saturday
Great, so your goal is to walk around your neighborhood for 30 minutes, twice a week on Fridays and Saturdays. On a scale of 1 to 10, how confident are you that you can achieve this goal?
That's excellent confidence. Now, how will you remind yourself to do these walks on Fridays and Saturdays?
I will set an alarm on my phone
Perfect, setting an alarm on your phone is a solid reminder system. Would you like to set another goal for this week?
no
Great work today, Jade! You'll be continuing with your bedtime routine and adding those Friday and Saturday walks. I'll see you next week at Session 3. Take care!
